remarks: Member of the span of a pair of vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lsppr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsppr.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lsppr.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lsppr.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lsppr.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lsppr.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsppr.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsppr.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lsppr.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspprel $p |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) <-> E. k e. K E. l e. K Z = ( ( k .x. X ) .+ ( l .x. Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ k l $.
$d .x. k l $.
$d F k l $.
$d K k l $.
$d N k l $.
$d V k l $.
$d W k l $.
$d X k l $.
$d Y k l $.

$d k l ph $.
